Name: bi xie
萆薢
Biological: Dioscorea collettii Hook. f. var. hypoglauca (Palib.) Pei et Ting (粉背薯蕷)
Dioscorea futschauensis R. Kun (福州薯蕷)

Maladies Treated: Bed wetting of small children (小兒遺尿)
Contraindications:
Do not use in cases of shenyinxu (kidney yin deficient).

According to Ben Cao Jing Ji Zhu, yi yi ren (coix seed) acts as its envoy. Incompatible with sunflower roots, da huang (rhubarb), chai hu (bupleurum root), mo li (jasmine flower), qian hu (hogfennel root).

According to Ben Cao Jing Shu, if the lower part of the body does not have dampness, or there is dripping after urination, or pain in the penis due to yinxu (yin deficient), or back pain due to shenxu (kidney deficient), it should not be used.

According to Ben Cao Bei Yao, it is not compatible with tea or vinegar.

According to Ben Jing Feng Yuan, in cases of yinxu (yin deficient) with spermatorrhea, or premature ejaculation due to weakness, frequent urination, and urgent need of defecation, using bi xie may cause the sickness to become worse.

Components: Dioscorea collettii Hook.f. contains Dimethyl-terephthalate (二甲基叉蕊酚)
Dioscorea gracillima Miq contains Furost-5-ene-3β,22,26-friol 3,26-bis-O-glycoside (喃醇)

(山萆薢)Dioscorea collettii Hook. f. var. hypoglauca (palib.) pei et Ting (粉背薯蕷)Dioscorea hypoglauca Palib(粉背薯蕷)Dioscorea collettii Hook.f.(叉蕊薯蕷)Dioscorea todoro Mak.(山 萆薢)Dioscorea gracillima Miq(纖 細薯蕷)Dioscorea futschauensis R.Kun (福 州薯蕷)Pron. in Japanese:日語發音﹕hikaiPron. in Korean:韓語發音﹕pihaePron. in Cantonese:粵音﹕bei1 gaai1Other Names:別名﹕chuan bi xie 川萆薢，shan bi xie 山萆薢，fen bi xie 粉萆薢。Common Name:英文名﹕fish poison yam rhizomeDistribution:產地﹕Mainly produced in southern part of Henan, southern part of Anhui, Zhejiang,Fujian, northern part of Taiwan, Jiangxi, Hubei, Hunan, Northern part ofGuangdong, Northeastern part of  Guangxi provices of China.分布於河南南部，安徽南部，浙江，福建，台灣北部，江西，湖北，湖南，廣東北部，廣西東北部等省區。Properties(characteristics)﹕性味﹕bitter, neutral and nontoxic.苦，平，無毒。Channels (meridians) entered: 歸經﹕liver, stomach and bladder.歸肝，胃，膀胱經。Medical functions:藥理﹕ antibiotic effect, ridding of parasites effect, lowering cholesterol effect, inhibiting cancer cell effect有抗菌殺虫作用，能降低血清膽固醇，可抑制腫瘤細胞。 (出處：中國中醫藥報)Actions & Indications:主治﹕for treatment of arthritis, glomerulonephritis, chronic prostatitis, chyluria, andchronic pelvic inflammation.關節炎，腎小球腎炎，慢性前列腺炎，尿路感染，乳糜尿，慢性盆腔炎等。Chemical ingredients:化學成份﹕薯 蕷 皂 苷 ( Dioscin ) ， 山 萆 薢 元 ( Tokorogenin ) ， 纖 細 薯 蕷 苷 ( Gracillin ) ， 考 蓋 元 ( Kogagenin ) ， 薯 蕷 元 ( Diosgenin ) ， 雅 姆 元 ( Yamogenin ) ， 約 諾 皂 ( Yononin ) ， 山 萆 薢 皂 ( Tokoronin ) 等 。 叉 蕊 薯 蕷 含 二 甲 基 叉 蕊 酚 (Dioscorea collettii Hook.f contains Dimethyl-terephthalate ) ， 纖 細 薯 蕷 含 喃 醇 (Dioscorea gracillima Miq contains Furost-5-ene-3β,22,26-friol  3,26-bis-O-glycoside ) 。 Dosage:用 量﹕10 to 15 g.10～15 克。Samples of formulae:處方 舉例﹕ Modern Research:現代研究﹕ Toxicity & Cautions:毒素與禁忌﹕Do not use in cases of shenyinxu (kidney yin deficient) According to Ben Cao Jing Ji Zhu, use with yi yi ren. Incompatible with sunflower roots, da huang, chai hu,  mo li, qian hu.According to Ben Cao Jing Shu , do no use if the lower part of the body does not have yeast infection, or dripping after urination, or pain in the penis due to yinxu (yin deficient) or back pain due to shenxu (kidney deficient) .According to Ben Cao Bei Yao, it is not compatible with tea or vinigar.According to Ben Jing Feng Yuan, in cases of  yinxu (yin deficient)  with spermatorrhea, or premature ejaculation due to weakness, frequent urination, urgent feeling the need of defecation, using bi xie may cause sickness to become worse.腎陰虛者 忌服。 ①《本 草經集注》：薏 苡仁為之使。 畏葵根，大 黃  ，柴 胡，牡 蠣，前 胡。 ②《本草經疏》：下部無濕，陰 虛火熾，以致溺有餘瀝，莖中痛，及腎 虛腰痛，並不宜服。 ③《本草備要》：忌茶葉，醋。 ④《本經逢原》：陰 虛精滑及元氣下陷不能攝精，小便頻數，大便引急者，誤用病必轉劇。 Sponsors' Ads by Google 以下為谷歌所提供贊助者之廣告A manuscript... writing, translating and proofreading  in progress Problems with website? Maladies Treated: Liver yang ascending with dizziness and blurry vision.
phlegm nodules (痰核), scrofula (瘰癧), abdominal masses accumulation (癥瘕積聚).
stomach pain with acid regurgitation; use duan (burnt) mu li (煅牡蠣) for acid-neutralizing and astringent action.
Dosage: 10 to 30 g in decoction. Smash first before boiling. Use sheng (raw) mu li for most indications; for astringent and securing (收斂固澀) and for acid-neutralizing, use duan (burnt) mu li.
Contraindications: Incompatible with ma huang (麻黃), xi xin (細辛), wu zhu yu (吳茱萸), lu sha (滷砂). Do not use when the body is weak with yangxu (yang deficiency/陽虛), or with shenxu (kidney deficiency) without fire (腎虛無火). Contraindicated in cold-induced spermatorrhea (寒精自出).
Research: In vivo, the acidic oyster shell (mu li) extract can inhibit polio virus infection in murines and reduces mortality. [1]
Notes:
When the prescription is written as mu li 牡蠣 or 牡力, it indicates sheng (raw) mu li: the shells are washed, dried under the sun, and smashed for use.

duan (burnt) mu li 煅牡蠣 (also written 煅牡力) is prepared by baking cleaned oyster shells over a smokeless fire until they become white, then cooling and smashing before use.

Cervical tuberculosis is usually a result of an infection in the lymph nodes, known as lymphadenitis.
References: [1] Zhong Hua Ben Cao 中華本草

mu li, oyster shell, Complementary and Alternative Healing University

mu li 牡蠣  
(in English and Chinese
    中英文) Edited by: Joe Hing kwok Chu 


Pharmaceutical name:
英文藥名﹕

Concha Ostreae

Botanical name:
學名﹕

Ostrea cucullata, Born.

Pron. in Japanese:日語發音﹕

borei

Pron. in Korean:韓語發音﹕

monyo

Pron. in Cantonese:粵音﹕

maau5 lai6

Other Names (Prescription names):別名 (處方名) ﹕

mu li 牡蠣、mu li 牡力、sheng (raw) mu li 生牡蠣、sheng (raw) mu li 生牡力、
duan (burnt) mu li 煅牡蠣、duan （burnt) mu li 煅牡力、mu li fen (powder)
牡蠣粉等。 When the prescription is written as mu li 牡蠣、牡力 it is raw mu li. It is the
shells that have been washed and dried under the sun and smashed. Duan (
burnt) mu li 煅牡蠣 also written as 煅牡力 are those have been baked on
smokeless fire till become white and being cooled down and smashed.  
處方中寫牡蠣、牡力指生牡蠣（或寫作生牡力）。為原藥洗淨晒干，碾碎
入藥者。  煅牡蠣又寫作煅牡力。為淨牡蠣置於無煙火上煅燒至灰白色，取出放涼，
碾碎入藥者。

Common Name:英文名﹕

oyster shell

Distribution:產地﹕

The herb is being produced along the coastal areas of China.
中國沿海各地。

Properties(characteristics)﹕性味﹕

salty, neutral, slightly cold, non-toxic.
味鹹，性平，微寒無毒 。

Channels (meridians) entered: 
歸經﹕

liver, kidney.
肝，腎。

Medical functions:
藥理﹕ 
It possesses the effects of:astringent, 
        sedation, detoxification, analgesia. In vivo the  acidic oyster 
        shell (mu li) extract can inhibit polio virus  infection murines 
        reduces mortality. [1]
anti-tumor
有收斂、鎮靜、解毒、鎮痛的作用；牡蠣的酸性提取物在活體中對脊髓灰質炎病毒抑制作用，使感染的鼠死亡率降低。【1】
抗癌腫
Actions & Indications:
主治﹕

Liver yang ascending with dizziness and blurry vision. 
lymphadenitis. 
organ prolapse 
neutralizing acid with baked mu li  
肝 陽 上 亢 ， 頭 暈 目 眩 。 
痰核，瘰癧，癥瘕積聚等證 。 
滑 脫 諸 證 。 
煆 牡 蠣 有 收 斂 制 酸 作 用 ， 可 治 胃 痛 泛 酸 。

Chemical ingredients:
化學成份﹕

calcium carbonate, calcium phosphate, calcium sulfate, organic compounds, magnesium, aluminum, silicon, ferric oxide etc..
碳酸鈣，磷酸鈣，硫酸鈣，有機化合物， 鎂，鋁，矽，氧化鐵等。

Dosage:用量﹕

10 to 30 g in decoction.
Smash first before boiling. Use raw mu li except in neutralizing
acid. To neutralizing acid use baked mu li.
10 - 30 克,煎 服。
宜 打 碎 先 煎 ； 除 收 斂 固 澀 煆 用 外 ， 餘 皆 生 用。

Samples of formulae:

    處方舉例﹕
 
Modern Research:
現代研究﹕
 
Toxicity & Cautions:
毒素與禁忌﹕

Incompatible with  
ma huang, xi xin,  wu zhu yu,   Not to use when the body is
weak and with condition of  
yangxu (yang deficient), or with condition of shenxu (kidney deficient) without heat. Those with spermatorrhea due to coldness also
should not use.
惡麻 黃、細 辛、吳茱萸，滷砂。凡病虛而  陽虛 者忌。腎虛無火，寒精自出
者亦忌。
    [1]

    Zhong Hua Ben Cao   

中華本草
Note：Cervical tuberculosis is usually a 
    result of an infection in the lymph nodes, known as lymphadenitis.

        Weather Report



         Last update: Aug 10, 2014; 11:50
        p.m. 
        LAH

Geography: Vietnam (origin; introduced into the Central Plains during Eastern Han, Jianwu 19 [AD 43] by General Ma Yuan)
Maladies Treated: Arthritis pain in joints and muscular rigidity
Spasms and contracture of the sinews and vessels
Difficulty in flexion and extension of the limbs
Damp Bi syndrome (painful obstruction due to dampness)
Bacterial or fungal infection (use raw yi yi ren [coix seed])
Medical Function: Tonifies the lung and clears heat
Respiratory function: oil of yi yi ren—small amount can stimulate breathing but large amount can suppress it (central).
Cardiovascular: effect of oil of yi yi ren on ex vitro heart of frog—low concentration has an excitatory effect; high concentration is inhibitory. (animal: frog)
Muscular: effect of oil of yi yi ren on striated muscles of frog—low concentration has an excitatory effect on skeletal muscle and peripheral nerves; high concentration is inhibitory. (animal: frog)
Anti-cancer: Coixenolide (C38H70O4) is an effective therapy for Ehrlich ascites sarcoma.

Promotes contraction of uterus: yi yi ren stimulates the uteri of guinea pigs; increases uterine tension, increases the amplitude of the vibration wave, and promotes uterine contraction; epinephrine can inhibit this effect. Thus yi yi ren should not be used by pregnant women. (animal: guinea pig)
Samples of Formulae:
For chronic arthritis: yi yi ren tang.

For muscle and joint pain: ma xing yi gan tang.

For chronic infection with pus: yi yi fu zi bai jiang san.

For appendicitis: chang yong tang.

For stones in the urinary tract: zhu ling tang add yi yi ren (yi yi ren [coix seed]).

For hydrocele of tunica vaginalis: Bian Xu (knotgrass) 30 g, raw Yi Yi Ren (coix seed) 30 g. Make into decoction. One dose per day. 7 days is one therapy period. [3]

Usage direction by processing: Use raw yi yi ren (coix seed) for clearing damp-heat and infection. Use stir-fried yi yi ren (coix seed) for strengthening the Spleen and improving digestion.
Contraindications:
Not for long-term usage in cases of deficiency (weakness) and coldness.

In cases of pi xu (spleen deficient) with loose stool, use stir-fried yi yi ren (coix seed).

Use caution during pregnancy.

Adulteration and mislabeling cautions: Reported cases of using sorghum (高粱米) as counterfeit; the two have different sources and effects and must not be mixed. Barley (大麥) has also been used as counterfeit. Observed in U.S. Chinese supermarkets: packages labeled in English as “Pearl Barley” with Chinese “薏米” but containing dehulled barley (Hordeum vulgare L.)—cannot be used as yi yi ren. Also seen packages labeled in English as “Pearl Barley” with Chinese “薏米” where contents are genuine yi yi ren; and packages labeled in English “Pearl Barley” with Chinese “洋薏米.” Barley and yi yi ren are entirely unrelated. Buyers must inspect the actual contents. 《浙江中醫雜志》1982；（8）：373 曾有報導。
Notes: Historical note: Origin in Southeast Asia (Vietnam, Thailand, India, Myanmar). Introduced into the Central Plains during Eastern Han, Jianwu 19 (AD 43) by General Ma Yuan. Currently mainly cultivated in Southeast Asia and in China (Fujian, Hebei, Liaoning, Jiangsu, Zhejiang).
References: 薏苡台中1號 之育成；曾 勝雄　高德錚 http://www.tdais.gov.tw/search/issn/41-50/doc/47-2.doc
1 . 星川清親 1980 新編食用作物 第15章 p.386~391 養賢堂 東京。
2. 江 文章 張子文 1991 薏苡的食療與加工利用 p.1~12 中國飲食文化學術研討會專輯    中國飲食文化基 金會。

Pharmaceutical name:英文藥名：Semen coicisBiological name: 拉丁名： Coix lacryma-jobi, Linn.Pron. in Japanese: 日語發音 yokuininPron. in Korean:韓語 發音：eui-i-inPron. in Cantonese:粵語：    薏米Other Names :別名： yi mi ren 薏米仁﹐yi ren 苡仁﹐mi ren 米仁Common Name:英文名：Job's-tearDistribution:分布：South east Asia, Taiwan and Mainland China.原產於越南 ﹐ 泰國﹐印度﹐緬甸等東南亞一帶(1)。 東漢光武帝建武19年(西 元43年)馬 援將軍從越南引入中原(2)， 目前主要栽培於東南亞及中國福 建， 河北，遼寧，江蘇，浙江等地。Properties (characteristics)：性味：sweet, bland, slightly cool甘﹐淡，微寒。  Channels (meridians) entered:歸經:spleen, stomach, lung脾﹐胃﹐肺。Actions & Indications: 主治：For improving digestion, enhancing the lung function, ridding of bacterial or fungal infection, arresting pain and itchiness. For treatment of  spastic muscles,  arthritis pain in joints and muscular rigidity. beri-beri and edema, vagina yeast infection, stones in the urinary tract, neualgia, difficulty in urination, lung abscess, gonorrhea, restless leg syndrome.Use raw yi yi ren for infection. Use stir fried yi yi ren for improving digestion.健 脾 ， 補 肺 清 熱 ， 去 風 利 濕 止癢 。筋 脈 拘 攣 ， 屈 伸 不 利 ， 濕 痺 ，腳 氣 水 腫 ，脾虚泄 瀉 ，白 帶 ， 腎結石，膀胱結石，神經痛，小 便 不 利 ，肺 癰 ， 淋 濁 ，不安腿症候群。清利濕熱宜生用。 健脾宜炒用。Medical function:    藥理作用﹕1. sedative, analgesic and antipyretic2. effect of oil of yi yi ren on breathing: small amount can stimulate breathing but large amount can suppress it.3. effect of oil of yi yi ren on ex vitro heart of frog: small amount can stimulate but large amount can suppress it.4. effect of oil of yi yi ren on striated muscles of frog: small amount can stimulate but large amount can suppress it.5. anti cancer：an active ingredient, Coixenolide is an effective therapy for Ehrlich ascites sarcoma.6. Promotes contraction of uterus: this herb stimulate the uteri of guinea pigs. It increases the tension of the uteri, increases the sizes of the vibration wave, and promotes the contraction of the uteri. Epinephrine can inhibit its effect. Thus yi yi ren should not be used by pregnant women.藥理作用﹕鎮靜鎮痛解熱作用呼吸功能：薏苡仁油對呼吸小量興奮，大量痲痹【中 樞性】。心血管作用：低濃度薏苡仁油對蛙的離體心臟有興奮 作用，高濃度則反之。肌肉作用：低濃度薏苡仁油對蛙的骨骼肌和末梢神經 有興奮作用，高濃度則反之。抗癌作用： 薏苡酯 (Coixenolide﹐C38H70O4) 對歐氏腹水腫 (Ehrlich ascites sarcoma) 有效。促進子宮收縮的作用: 薏苡仁對豚 鼠子宮呈興奮作用，使子宮緊張度增加、振幅增大，能促進子宮收縮的作用，但腎上腺素可以反其抑制作用，所 以懷孕婦女忌用薏苡仁。  Samples of formulae: 處方例子：  For chronic arthritis: yi yi ren tangFor muscle and joint pain: ma xing yin gan tangFor chronic infection with puss: yi yi fu zi bai jiang sanFor appendicitis: chang yong tangFor stones in the urinary tract: zhu ling tang add yi yi renFor hydrocele of tunica vaginalis: bian xu 30 g, yi yi ren 30 g. Make into decoction.  One dose per day. 7 days is one therapy period.  [3]治慢性關節 炎﹕薏苡仁湯 治肌肉痛及關節痛﹕麻杏薏甘湯 治慢性化膿性疾患﹕薏苡附子敗醬 散 治盲腸炎﹕腸廱湯 治腎臟結石﹐膀胱結石﹕豬苓湯加薏苡仁治療鞘膜積液：扁 蓄 30g，生薏苡仁 30g，水煎服，日1劑。7天為1療程。【3】  Chemical ingredients:化學成份﹕  I. Seed contain:51.9% of starch,17.6% of protein,  ﹐7.2% of oil ﹐Palmitic acid,Myristic acid﹐Coixenolide,II. Root contains coixol. ( C8H7O3N)種子含: 澱粉  51.9%， 蛋白質 17.6%   ，棕櫚酸  ﹐ 肉 豆 蔻 酸  ， 薏苡酯  ,脂肪油 7.2% (oil)，薏苡根: 含有薏苡素( C8H7O3N)Dosage:用量: 18 g to 38 g, in decoction.18 克至38克， 煎服。Cautions:禁忌:Not  for long term usage in cases of deficiency (weakness) and coldness. In cases of pixu (spleen deficient) with loose stool, use stir  fried yi yi ren.Use caution during pregnancy. 脾虛便 溏者用炒苡 仁。大虛大寒者不 宜久用。孕婦慎服。【3】《浙江中醫雜志》1982；（8）：373曾有報導有以高粱米假冒，二者來源，功效均不相 同，不可混用。 也有用大麥假冒的。作者在美國的華人超级市場看到在包娤上英文寫 Pearl Barley 而 中 文寫薏米。包装中是;去 殼大麥 (Hordeum vulgare L.)。不能當薏米用 。也 有在包娤上英文寫 Pearl Barley 而中文寫薏米。但是包装中是薏米。不是去 殼大麥。 也看 到在包娤上英文寫 Pearl Barley 而中 文寫洋薏米。其實大麥和薏米完全没關係。所以購買者須看清楚包装内是什麽。參考文獻﹕薏苡台中1號 之育成；曾 勝雄　高德錚http://www.tdais.gov.tw/search/issn/41-50/doc/47-2.doc1 .  星川清親 1980 新編食用作物 第15章 p.386~391 養賢堂 東京。2.  江 文章 張子文 1991 薏苡的食療與加工利用 p.1~12 中國飲食文化學術研討會專輯    中國飲食文化基 金會。 Sponsors' Ads by Google 以下為谷歌所提供贊助者之廣告 A manuscript... writing, translating and proofreading  in progress Click here for inquiry  Copyright Notice 按此 看關於版權問題List of Health ProblemsChinese Herb DictionaryToxicity of Some HerbsSide Effect of Some HerbsHerbs that can be toxic to kidneysTraditional Chinese MedicineTCM DiagnosisSamples of FormulaeTerms of Traditional Chinese MedicineAcupuncturecopy right 版權所有Qigong (chi kung)Prescribed Drug DictionaryEmail our web master for  your suggestion (not for inquiry)Biochemistry DictionaryGeneral Online LibraryQigong classesFake Email WarningResearch LibrarianSearchQigong classesHomeWeather Report    DisclaimerLast update: July 25 2012, 4:58 p.m. LAH

Name: gou teng
鉤藤
Botanical: Uncaria macrophylla Wall. 大葉鉤藤
Uncaria sessilifructus Roxb. 無柄果鉤藤
Uncaria scandens (Smith) Hutch. 攀茎鉤藤
Other: tiao teng gou zi 鉤藤鉤子
dao gua jin gou 倒挂金鉤

Geography: Ourouparia rhynchophylla Matsum is distributed in Fujian, Guangdong, Guangxi, Jiangxi, Hunan, Sichuan, Guizhou. The herb is mainly produced in Guangxi, Jiangxi, Hunan, Zhejiang, Guangdong.
Uncaria sinensis Haviland is distributed in Hunnan, Hubei, Guangxi, Sichuan, Guizhou, Yunnan. The herb is mainly produced in Sichuan, Guizhou, Yunnan, and Hubei.
Maladies Treated: Hypertension due to liver yang ascending, with blurry vision, dizziness and headache.
Swollen and red eyes due to liver heat.
Seizure in small children due to liver heat wind syndrome.
Influenza with seizure (感冒夾驚) in the context of liver heat wind syndrome.
Epilepsy (sedative effect lowers the excitement of the central nervous system and helps treatment of epilepsy).
Rheumatoid arthritis (using gou teng 15–24 g as decoction; see Samples of Formulae).
Parkinson's disease (see Samples of Formulae; note: decocting over 15 minutes makes it ineffective for Parkinson's disease).
Depression of middle age and old age people (see Samples of Formulae).
Dementia (see Samples of Formulae: gou teng san, yi gan san).
Over active sympathetic nervous system with hypertension (自律神經亢進兼有高血壓).
Medical Function: Sedative effect: lowers the excitement of the central nervous system and helps treatment of epilepsy
Lowers blood pressure (does not cause peripheral vasodilation); note that old stems without thorns do not possess this anti-hypertension effect
Effective for vascular type of dementia
For liver heat wind syndrome (including heat stirring liver wind, pediatric convulsions, influenza with convulsions).
Dosage:
For decoction: 4.5 g to 9 g (1.5–3 錢). Or use in powder form.
If using in decoction do not boil for long time; it should be put into the pot during the later stage of decocting. Boiling over 15 minutes will weaken its effectiveness in the lowering blood pressure in liver yang ascending syndrome, and it will not be effective in treating Parkinson's disease. It is advisable to write down in prescription that the herb should be put in last and cook for only 10 minutes.
Samples of Formulae:
Over active sympathetic nervous system with hypertension: tian ma (Gastrodia) gou teng (Uncaria stems with hooks) yin.

Rheumatoid arthritis: gou teng (Uncaria stems with hooks) 15 to 24 g. Boil with water for about 15 minutes. Drink as tea while warm.

Parkinson's disease; depression of middle age and old age people: gou teng (Uncaria stems with hooks) san.

Dementia: gou teng (Uncaria stems with hooks) san; yi gan san.
Contraindications:
In animals, large amounts can cause damage to the heart and liver and even death.
According to classical writings: Ben Cao New Edition (本草新编): "It can damage qi and do not use in cases of deficiencies." Ben Cao Cong Xin (本草從新): "Do not use in cases of lacking fire."
Research:
Sedative effect: lowers the excitement of the central nervous system and helps treatment of epilepsy.

Lowering blood pressure effect (does not cause peripheral vasodilation); old stems without thorns do not possess the anti-hypertension effect.

Anti-platelet coagulation.

Effective for vascular type of dementia.

[1] J Pharmacol Sci. 2013;122(4):257-69. Epub 2013 Jul 25.
Notes: Pre-eclampsia: abnormal condition in pregnancy or postpartum with hypertension, edema, and seizures, cardiac exhaustion, kidney failure, and strokes. If not treated in time it may cause death.
Chemical Ingredients: Hooked stems, branchlets, and leaves (Ramulus Uncariae cum Uncis) contain: rhynchophylline (鉤藤鹼/钧藤鹼).
Hooked stems, branchlets, and leaves contain: isorhynchophylline (異鉤藤鹼).
Hooked stems, branchlets, and leaves contain: corynoxeine (柯諾辛因鹼; 赛雞纳鹼).
Hooked stems, branchlets, and leaves contain: isocorynoxeine (異柯諾辛因鹼; 異赛雞纳鹼).
Hooked stems, branchlets, and leaves contain: corynantheine (兜花木鹼).
Hooked stems, branchlets, and leaves contain: dihydrocorynantheine (二氫兜花木鹼).
Hooked stems, branchlets, and leaves contain: hirsutine (硬毛帽柱木鹼).
Hooked stems, branchlets, and leaves contain: hirsuteine (硬毛帽柱木因鹼; 去氫毛帽柱木鹼).
Hooked stems, branchlets, and leaves contain: dihydrocorynantheine (二氫柯楠因鹼).

Jacks.Uncaria macrophylla Wall 大葉鉤藤Uncaria hirsuta Haviland 毛鉤藤Uncaria sinensis Haviland 華鉤藤Uncaria sessilifructus Roxb.無柄果鉤藤Uncaria scandens  (Smith) Hutch. 攀茎鉤藤Pron. in Japanese:日語發音﹕chotokoPron. in Korean:韓語發音﹕kuduingPron. in Cantonese:粵音﹕gau1  tang4Other Names:別名﹕tiao teng 釣藤 , tiao teng 吊藤 , tiao teng gou zi 鉤藤鉤子,  tiao gou teng 釣鉤藤 , ying zhao feng 莺爪风, ying zao feng 鷹爪風﹐nen gou gou 嫩鉤鉤 , jin gou teng 金鉤藤 , gua gou teng 挂 鉤藤 ,gou ting 鉤丁 , dao gua jin gou 倒挂金鉤 ,  gou er 鉤耳 .Common Name:英文名﹕gamdir vine, uncaria stems with hooksDistribution:產地﹕Ourouparia rhynchophylla Matsum is distributed in Fujian, Guangdong,Guangxi, Jiangxi, Hunan, Sichuan, Guizhou. The herb is mainly producedin Guangxi, Jiangxi, Hunan, Zhejiang, Guangdong.Uncaria sinensis Haviland is distributed in Hunnan, Hubei, Guangxi,Sichuan, Guizhou, Yunnan. The herb is mainly produced in Sichuan,Guizhou, Yunnan, and Hubei.1. 鉤藤分布浙江，福建，廣東，廣西，江西，湖南，四川，貴州等地。藥材主產廣西，江西，湖南，浙江，廣東。2. 華鉤藤分布湖南，湖北，廣西，四川，贵州，云南等地。药材主產四川，貴州，云南，湖北等地。Properties characteristics)﹕性味﹕sweet, cool.甘，凉。Channels  meridians) entered: 歸經﹕liver, pericardium歸肝，心包經。Medical functions:藥理﹕ (1) sedative effect: lower the excitement of CNS helps treatment of epilepsy.(2) lowering blood pressure effect (but does not cause peripheral vasodilation) but old stems without thorns do not possess the anti-hypertension effect.(3) anti platelet coagulation(4) effective for vascular type of dementia藥理﹕鎮靜作用﹕降低中樞 神經系統興奮性。降血壓作用(但不擴張外圍血管)﹕無刺的老枝不具有降血壓作用。抗血小板凝聚。對血管性的癡呆症有效Actions & Indications:主治﹕Actions & Indications:for liver yang ascending: hypertension, blurry vision, dizziness and headachefor liver heat: swollen and red eyesfor liver heat wind syndrome: seizure in small children, influenza with seizurefor pre-eclampsia in pregnant women主治﹕治肝陽上亢，血壓高，目眩，頭暈頭痛。清 肝热：目赤腫痛 ,息肝風：可治熱動肝風，小兒急驚風，感冒夾驚，婦人子痫。Chemical ingredients:化學成份﹕带鉤茎枝叶含 Ramulus Uncariae cum Uncis contain﹕钧藤鹼 Rhynchophylline異 鉤藤鹼 Isorhynchophylline柯 諾辛因鹼 Corynoxeine異 柯諾辛因鹼 Isocorynoxeine柯楠因鹼 Corynantheine二氫柯楠因鹼 Dihydrocorynantheine硬毛帽柱木鹼 Hirsutine硬毛帽柱木因鹼 Hirsuteine異 鉤藤鹼  isorhynchophylline 赛 雞纳鹼 corynoxeine 異 赛雞纳鹼 isocorynoxeine毛帽柱木鹼 hirsutine去氫毛帽柱木鹼 hirsuteine兜花木鹼 corynantheine  二氫兜花木鹼 dihydro-corynantheine Dosage:用量﹕For decoction: 4.5 g to 9 g. Or use in powder form. If using in decoction do not boil for long time. It should be put into the pot during the later stage of decocting. Boiling over 15 minutes will weaken its effectiveness in the lowering blood pressure in liver yang ascending syndrome, and it will not be effective in treating Parkinson's disease. . It is advisable to write down in prescription that the herb should be put in last and cook for only10 minutes.煎湯:1.5～3錢；或入散劑。入湯劑 不宜久煎,宜 後下。如 煮沸15分鐘以上，其治肝陽上亢 降壓效能顯著减弱，對治帕金森氏症則無效。故忌久煎。處方時應該註明後下。再煮10分鐘即可起鍋。Samples of formulae:處方舉例﹕Over active sympathetic nervous system with hypertension:tian ma gou teng yin For rheumatoid arthritis:gou teng 15 to 24 g.Boil with water for about 15 minutes. Drink as tea while warm. For Parkinson's disease, depression of middle age and old age people: gou teng san For dementia: gou teng san, yi gan san  [1] 肝陽上亢﹐自律神經亢進﹐兼有高血壓﹕天麻鉤藤飲 風濕性關節炎﹕ 鉤 藤  15 克~24 克。加水煎15分鐘。溫服。 帕金森氏症；中，老年人憂鬱症：鉤藤散痴呆症：鉤藤散，抑肝散 [1] Modern Research:現代研究﹕ Toxicity & Cautions:毒素與禁忌﹕In animals large amounts can cause damage to the heart and liver and even death.According to classical writings, "Ben Cao New Edition": "It can damage qi and do not use in cases of deficiencies" and according to  "Ben Cao Cong Xin": "Do not use in cases of lacking fire."大劑量可導致動物心，肝 ，損傷 而死亡。《本草新编》： "最能盗氣，虚者勿投。"《本草從新》："無火者勿服。"[1] J Pharmacol Sci. 2013;122(4):257-69. Epub 2013 Jul 25. Pre-eclampsia: abnormal condition in pregnancy or postpartum with hypertension, edema, and seizures, cardiac exhaustion, kidney failure, and strokes. If not treated in time it may cause death. 子痫是妊娠高血壓综合症最嚴重的階段，患者會出現抽搐，昏迷，心力衰竭，腎臟功能衰竭等症状，并可發生子宫卒中，腦溢血等并發症，如不及時搶救，可致孕婦死亡。 Sponsors' Ads by Google 以下為谷歌所提供贊助者之廣告 Email our web master for  your suggestion (not for inquiry)    Click here for inquiry  Copyright Notice 按此看關於版權問題List of Health ProblemsChinese Herb DictionaryToxicity of Some Herbs  Side Effect of Some Herbs  Herbs that can be toxic to kidneysTraditional Chinese MedicineTCM DiagnosisSamples of FormulaeAcupuncturecopy right 版權所有Qigong (chi kung)Prescribed Drug DictionaryEmail our web master for  your suggestion (not for inquiry)Biochemistry DictionaryGeneral Online LibraryQigong classesFake Email WarningResearch LibrarianSearchQigong classes HomeWeather Report    DisclaimerLast update: Mar 11, 2012; 10:25 p.m. LAHSearch this site

Name: hui peng cao
灰蓬草
Other name: Mongolian: hao xi yi ha ma ha ge

Samples of Formulae:
Mainly used in making potash by burning the plant.
Mainly for producing potassium carbonate.
Contraindications: Leaves contain large amount of calcium oxalate.
Notes: Local people collect hui peng cao to burn into ash to make alkali (lye).
